title: ‘Two Golds is the Dream’: Inside Filippo Ganna’s Double Olympic Ambition
content:
'It's too bad to miss the Tour, but the Olympics are the Olympics': Ganna puts gold medal quest ahead of Italian start of the Tour de France in 2024.

Read the full article at ‘Two Golds is the Dream’: Inside Filippo Ganna’s Double Olympic Ambition on Velo.
author: ahood
